item.title: The Power of Music: How It Affects Your Mood and Health
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Music has been a part of human culture since the dawn of civilization. From tribal chants to classical compositions, people have turned to music for entertainment, emotional expression, and cultural identity. But did you know that music can also have a powerful effect on your mood and health? In this article, we will explore the...

The post The Power of Music: How It Affects Your Mood and Health appeared first on The New Vibes.
